title: TotalEnergies, Amazon form partnership on electricity supply and online strategy
text: TotalEnergies and Internet giant Amazon announced a collaboration, whereby French energy company would supply renewable electricity to the U.S. online retail giant, while Amazon would help TotalEnergies' digital strategy.

title: The Tech Sector's Enormous Earnings Power
text: The big 5 Tech companies-Apple, Microsoft, Alphabet, Amazon and Facebook-are combined expected to earn +79.4% more in Q2 on +35.7% higher revenues relative to the same period last year.

title: Amazon Reports Earnings Thursday. Expect a Blowout.
text: The Street consensus calls for $115.4 billion in sales and $7.8 billion in operating income. There are several reasons why the estimates might be too low.

title: Why Amazon Stock Should Run 40% Higher Sooner Than Later
text: Amazon should report stellar free cash flow for Q2, pushing AMZN stock 40% higher. AMZN stock is worth $5,055 per share, or almost 40% above today's price using a 2% FCF yield metric.

title: 3 Diverse Forever Tech Stocks to Buy Today
text: Out-of-favor discounting has led to the intersection of value and growth on the price charts of three industry-leading tech stocks. The post 3 Diverse Forever Tech Stocks to Buy Today appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Amazon Earnings: What to Look For

title: A Look at Amazon's (AMZN) Big Week

title: After Flipkart, Amazon files appeal at India's Supreme Court in antitrust probe
text: Amazon.com Inc on Wednesday filed an appeal with India's top court against a state court's order that allowed an antitrust probe against the U.S. firm and Walmart's Flipkart to continue, according to source and court listings.
